meanings.definition: To undergo a chemical reaction or decomposition as a result of exposure to light.
meanings.sent1: The plant's leaves photolyzed when sunlight touched them.
meanings.sent2: The plastic bottle photolyzed under the intense sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The cookies photolyzed in the sun, turning into a gooey mess.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams photolyzed in the harsh light of reality.
meanings.sent5: The ice sculpture photolyzed into a puddle under the hot sun.

meanings.definition: To break down or decompose through the action of light.
meanings.sent1: The paint on the wall photolyzed after years of sun exposure.
meanings.sent2: The old newspaper photolyzed into fragments in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate bar photolyzed in the sun, becoming a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: His confidence photolyzed under the spotlight of criticism.
meanings.sent5: The sandcastle photolyzed into grains under the bright sun.
